description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Silverbeet Rissoles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken & Silverbeet Rissoles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Cook rissoles, in batches for 4-5 minutes each side or until cooked through. Serve.
